channel.title: Saving with layers in Adobe illustrator
channel.description: I need to be able to save a file in layers with adobe illustrator Cs3 for editing in after effects but everytime i save it just merges them into one layer how can i save with layers?

item.title: Saving with layers in Adobe illustrator
item.dc:creator: Dr_Perky
item.description:
yeah it wouldn’t show me layers and if i tried to move it around in AE it just moved the whole picture not the layers. but i’ve decided to try and do everything i’m trying to do through AE it takes longer but it works.

also i think may have something to do with the fact that i have illustrator CS3 and After effects CS4

Read full topic
item.source: Saving with layers in Adobe illustrator

item.description:
That’s weird. I save with layers all the time.
